# url-chart
generate chart by one url like: https://zhengxiaoyao0716.github.io/url-chart/?t=line&i=1,2,3,4,5,6&l=test1&c=ff6384&v=0,10,5,2,20,30,45&l=test2&c=36a2eb&v=-10,0,10,20,30,40,50

- ?t=TYPE
- &i=INDEXES
- &l=LABEL
- &c=COLOR
- &v=VALUES
